comment: Bill is clearly highly experienced, and is able to distill tax concepts into simple to understand rules that are applicable to everyday life. His lectures are clearly very well practiced. Attendance isn't mandatory and he is not a tough grader.
Wished he taught more classes at ksu in the upper level tax class. He makes class fun to learn he treats it like your learning how to do the job. We need more professor to teach this way!!

Best accounting professor I have had! He cares about you learning and retaining the information he is a little bit of a tough grader but is pretty straight forward with assignments and the way he grades. Open notes on everything he makes this class a hands on experience real world work. goes by william cleary
rating_tags: Tough grader--Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes

comment: "In the real world everything is open notes but you're wasting your clients time if you look everything up" With having everything open notes it really makes the students look at the content repeatedly and learn it by constantly seeing it all the time. Class isn't mandatory but you won't pass if you don't go. material for assignments is taught
